properties.title: Chamanna Cluozza
properties.description: The Chamanna Cluozza is the only catered hut in the National Park. It is located in the heart of the Swiss National Park at 1889 m and offers simple and cosy accommodation in rooms or dormitory. It is an ideal starting point for hikes in the Val Cluozza, the first valley that the municipality of Zernez made available to the nascent National Park back in 1909. Sleeps 61, 34 places in group dormitories (mattress camps) and 27 places in rooms of various sizes.
